body_html:
Thanks for considering to support this in 1.6.0. Just as @krm1312, we would like to avoid building TF Java ourselves, which indeed needs another toolchain.

It seems sensible to me that TF Java would support the same platforms as TF Python, and TF Python 1.5 does support 14.04 (and CentOS 7) (not that I'm asking for a 1.5.1 or so, 1.6 is ok).

body:
Thanks for considering to support this in 1.6.0. Just as @krm1312, we would like to avoid building TF Java ourselves, which indeed needs another toolchain.

It seems sensible to me that TF Java would support the same platforms as TF Python, and TF Python 1.5 does support 14.04 (and CentOS 7) (not that I'm asking for a 1.5.1 or so, 1.6 is ok).
